title: 1964년 Bixby 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Bixby. 판결일: 1964-05-14. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: In the Matter of Whitmier & Ferris Co., Inc. v. R. Burdell Bixby, Individually and Constituting the New York State Thruway Authority
**판결일**: 1964-05-14
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 21 A.D.2d 738

## 판결문 요약


Judgment unanimously affirmed, with costs. Memorandum: The petition does not state facts sufficient to entitle appellant to the relief demanded therein and was properly dismissed. (Appeal from a judgment of Erie Special Term dismissing the petition.) Present — Bastow, J. P., Goldman, Henry, Noonan and Del Vecchio, JJ.
...
